main.name: Lin Ming
main.description: Top talented web developer of 7+ years of experience dedicated to building and optimizing the performance of user-centrist, high-impact websites and solutions for nationwide and global companies.
main.bio: Leverage technical, analytical and problem-solving skills to create dynamic, high-speed websites, apps and platforms fueling competitive advantage and revenue growth.

work.title: Freelancer

work.title: Senior Developer
work.description:
Improves systems performance by investigating problems, developing specifications, identifying trends in technology, and recommending solutions 
Assist other developers in resolving issues by providing guidance and training 
Performs other duties as assigned by management 
May make hardware or software purchasing recommendations regarding web development 
Work is constantly performed in an office environment 
May develop a range of products including device drivers, patches, operating system modifications, graphics modules, etc 
Collaborate with web-developers building a browser-based front-end using HTML and JavaScript

work.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
work.description:

Design and develop tools to improve efficiency 
Administer document management and content management systems 
Provide documentation of developed code 
Provide basic levels of effort associated with work requests
